lead_paragraph: Chelsea have signed left back Marcos Alonso from Italian top-flight club Fiorentina on a five-year contract, the Premier League side announced on Wednesday.

headline.print_headline: Chelsea Sign Defender Alonso From Fiorentina
headline.main: Chelsea Sign Defender Alonso From Fiorentina

snippet: Chelsea have signed left back Marcos Alonso from Italian top-flight club Fiorentina on a five-year contract, the Premier League side announced on Wednesday....
